function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sporadic cases of COVID-19 leading to local transmission","Impact":"Increased spread of the disease within immediate contacts","Mitigation":"Performing contact tracing and quarantining infected individuals","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing and isolation facilities","People":"Immediate family members, friends, colleagues","Owner":"Health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Clusters of COVID-19 cases with unknown transmission source","Impact":"Difficulty in tracing source of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Geographical lockdown to prevent further spread","Technologies":"Geolocation tracking, surveillance systems","People":"General population in affected geographic location","Owner":"Government, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Community transmission leading to large outbreaks and high number of incidents and deaths","Impact":"Outbreak gets out of control, need for cure or vaccine","Mitigation":"Development and distribution of effective treatments or vaccines","Technologies":"Vaccine development, treatment research and production facilities","People":"General population in affected country","Owner":"Global health organizations, pharmaceutical companies"}]}
